revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-842 |revision=C1 |asin=B00PVDVYIS |newegg=N82E16833127702 |fcc_date=07/03/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR842C1 |ic_id=4216A-IR842C1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563 |cpu1_cspeed=750 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6SB-25 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9888 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, PK648NXZ, 1648, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX, dlink-XXXX-5GHz |default_ssid_regex=^dlink-[A-F0-9]{4}$ , ^dlink-[A-F0-9]{4}-5GHz$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |oui=40:9B:CD |oui_eth=40:9B:CD }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ac1200-wi-fi-router-2/}}{{SupportPage|https://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DIR-842}}
Web GUI: http://dlinkrouter.local
Although D-Link does not appear to be claiming Wave2 MU-MIMO or VHT160 (VHT80+80) support in its marketing literature for this product, the QCA9888 chip should support these features and the Test Report NII document at the FCC mentions VHT80+80 support for 802.11ac. FCC documents also cover the, as yet unreleased, [[D-Link DIR-843 rev A1]] model which may have been intended to be differentiated from this DIR-842 by enabling these features in software.
The default SSID format for the device would seem to be '''dlink-''' followed by the last two octets of the MAC indicated on the label.
